title: Manage Investigator Site Payments
description: A clinical finance specialist needs to process a payment to a clinical trial site based on completed patient visits.

tasks.description: Retrieve data from the EDC system on the number of completed patient visits for a specific site.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the site has completed 10 'Visit 3' procedures in the last month.

tasks.description: Cross-reference the site's clinical trial agreement (CTA) to find the payment amount per visit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the CTA specifies a payment of $500 per 'Visit 3'.

tasks.description: Calculate the total payment due to the site.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the total payment as 10 * $500 = $5,000.

tasks.description: Generate an invoice and submit it to the accounts payable system for processing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the invoice and initiates the payment process.
